    • 方法详细资料

      • getNowFullTime

        public static long getNowFullTime()
        return current full time format as YYYYMMDDHHMMSS
        返回:
        long

      • getNowTime

        public static int getNowTime()
        return current time format as HHMMSS
        返回:
        int

      • getNowDate

        public static int getNowDate()
        return current date format as YYYYMMDD
        返回:
        int

      • getDateCompareToday

        public static int getDateCompareToday(int day)
        return custom date base of today, format as YYYYMMDD
        参数:
        day, - the number of day after or before, 0 represents today
        返回:
        int

      • calculateBySecondsCompareNow

        public static long calculateBySecondsCompareNow(long timeday)
        calculate the time distance between now and target time in millisecond
        参数:
        day -
        time -
        返回:
        millisecond

      • validateTime

        public static int validateTime(PolicyModel.TimeAndDate timeAndDate)
        validate the system time by comparing with time and date in policy
        参数:
        timeAndDate -
        返回:
        the status of time: PolicyModel.TimeAndDate.VALID, TimeAndDate#INVALID , PolicyModel.TimeAndDate.EXPIRED
        另请参阅:
        TimeThread

      • checkTimeData

        public static void checkTimeData(PolicyModel.TimeAndDate data)
                          throws java.lang.Throwable
        check time data
        if invalid, throw exception
        参数:
        data -
        抛出:
        java.lang.Throwable
